50 #ifndef cec6par_h
51 #define cec6par_h
52 
53 #include "lib_pvmodel.h"
54 
55 
56 
57 /*
58  Implementation of CEC 5 (6) parameter model as presented by
59  DeSoto, Klein, and Beckman, Solar Energy Journal 2005
60  http://minds.wisconsin.edu/handle/1793/7602
61 */
62 
63 class cec6par_module_t : public pvmodule_t
64 {
65 public:
66  double Area;
67  double Vmp;
68  double Imp;
69  double Voc;
70  double Isc;
71  double alpha_isc;
72  double beta_voc;
73  double a;
74  double Il;
75  double Io;
76  double Rs;
77  double Rsh;
78  double Adj;
79 
80  cec6par_module_t();
81 
82  virtual double AreaRef() { return Area; }
83  virtual double VmpRef() { return Vmp; }
84  virtual double ImpRef() { return Imp; }
85  virtual double VocRef() { return Voc; }
86  virtual double IscRef() { return Isc; }
87 
88  virtual bool operator() ( pvinput_t &input, double TcellC, double opvoltage, pvoutput_t &output );
89 };
90 
91 
92 class noct_celltemp_t : public pvcelltemp_t
93 {
94 public:
95  double standoff_tnoct_adj;
96  double ffv_wind;
97  double Tnoct;
98 
99  virtual bool operator() ( pvinput_t &input, pvmodule_t &module, double opvoltage, double &Tcell );
100 };
101 
102 
103 class mcsp_celltemp_t : public pvcelltemp_t
104 {
105 public:
106  double DcDerate; // DC derate factor (0..1)
107  int MC; // Mounting configuration (1=rack,2=flush,3=integrated,4=gap)
108  int HTD; // Heat transfer dimension (1=Module,2=Array)
109  int MSO; // Mounting structure orientation (1=does not impede flow beneath, 2=vertical supports, 3=horizontal supports)
110  int Nrows, Ncols; // number of modules in rows and columns, when using array heat transfer dimensions
111  double Length; // module length, along horizontal dimension, (m)
112  double Width; // module width, along vertical dimension, (m)
113  double Wgap; // gap width spacing (m)
114  double TbackInteg; // back surface temperature for integrated modules ('C)
115 
116  virtual bool operator() ( pvinput_t &input, pvmodule_t &module, double opvoltage, double &Tcell );
117 };
118 
119 #endif
